division_chart.title: Top Represented Divisions in the Catalog

highlights.title: Highlights
items: New Beacon Template available to build "CloudOS Deployable" MCP Servers built with the MCP-Commons reference Resource server and protected by APS Identity in conjunction with our ApigeeX offering for authentication
Improved User Experience implemented in "Observability" tab for service entities, now called "Monitor" with sub-tab sections including the two inner-sourced tabs: Synthetics and Dynatrace.
More efficient and automated process to share Beacon secrets with our inner-source collaborators.

up_next.title: Up Next
items: Marvelous team will be translating your Backstage System Model entities to the new Autodesk System Model. Next, we will be notifying users for your review.
Availability plugin is being inner-sourced to Beacon and soon will be ready on Production.
Beacon will be enabled to display the new Runbook v2 (Markdown) files on systems entities to reduce fragmented documentation.

footer.text: Beacon is your one-stop developer portal at Autodesk. The user-friendly platform is created with the goal to boost your productivity, providing you with all the necessary information and workflows.
